content: I'm using a Nikon D5600 camera body with my 50mm prime lens. I've been mostly using manual focus mode lately due to some issues with the autofocus on my old 18-55mm kit lens. The focus issues I'm experiencing are mostly with the subject's eyes not being sharp, even when I'm using the "focus and recompose" technique. I'm usually shooting in a studio setting with artificial lighting, and I've been trying out different aperture settings to achieve a shallow depth of field.
